amendment.description: Amendment to the Shays substitute amendment (A002) provides for the establishment of the Independent Commission on Campaign Finance Reform with the purpose of studying the laws relating to the financing of political activity and reporting and recommending legislation to reform those laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 as printed in House Report 105-567. The amendment adds a new title establishing an independent commission on campaign finance reform.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Maloney (NY) to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 325 - 78, 1 Present (Roll No. 250).
